title: Sub Question 1
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point: Dido (Elissa).

Must be identified by name.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points:

1 point: Dido (Elissa).

Must be identified by name.

Student response earns one of the available points:

1 point: Dido (Elissa).

Must be identified by name.

title: Sub Question 2
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

1 point per action.

Reference to the Latin required for each action.

The description may be contained in the translation.

Four possible answers:

convivia quaerit: she seeks banquets

demens: (she is) mad, irrational

audire labores exposcit: she demands to hear of the toils

pendet...narrantis ab ore: she hangs from the mouth of the speaker

title: Sub Question 3
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

1 point: for mentioning either of the following:

(A) Pallanteum is the future site of Rome.

(B) (Evander's) Pallanteum gives Aeneas aid in the Latin War.

1 point: additional for mentioning both (A) and (B) or expanding on the significance of (A) or (B).
